description.zh-cn: 明朝第八位皇帝。
description.en: The 8th Emperor of the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第六及第八位皇帝，明宪宗之父。
description.en: The 6th and 8th emperor of the Ming dynasty, father of the Chenghua Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗贵妃，明宪宗生母。
description.en: A consort of Emperor Yingzong and the birth mother of the Chenghua Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第九位皇帝，明宪宗第三子和继任者。
description.en: The 9th emperor of the Ming dynasty, the third son and successor of the Chenghua Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第七位皇帝，明宪宗的叔叔。
description.en: The 7th emperor of the Ming dynasty, uncle of the Chenghua Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明朝名臣，后被明宪宗平反。
description.en: A famous minister of the Ming dynasty, later rehabilitated by the Chenghua Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗时期的贤臣，内阁首辅。
description.en: A capable minister and Grand Secretary during the reign of the Chenghua Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗时期的贤臣。
description.en: A capable minister during the reign of the Chenghua Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗时期的贤臣。
description.en: A capable minister during the reign of the Chenghua Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗的宠妃，比宪宗年长17岁。
description.en: The favorite consort of the Chenghua Emperor, 17 years his senior.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗时期的权监，西厂提督。
description.en: A powerful eunuch during the reign of the Chenghua Emperor, head of the Western Depot.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗设立的特务机构。
description.en: A secret service agency established by the Chenghua Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗被瓦剌俘虏的事件，导致时为皇长子的朱见深被立为太子。
description.en: The event where Emperor Yingzong was captured by the Oirats, leading to Zhu Jianshen's appointment as crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 明英宗复辟的政变，朱见深因此被重立为太子。
description.en: The coup that restored Emperor Yingzong to the throne, leading to Zhu Jianshen's reappointment as crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 景泰帝之子，曾取代朱见深为太子。
description.en: Son of the Jingtai Emperor, who briefly replaced Zhu Jianshen as crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗时期的一名中官，善于以诙谐幽默的方式进谏。
description.en: A court official during the Chenghua era, skilled in offering remonstrance through humor.

description.zh-cn: 弹劾汪直的御史。
description.en: An imperial censor who impeached Wang Zhi.

description.zh-cn: 成化年间发生在荆襄地区的流民起义。
description.en: A refugee rebellion in the Jingxiang area during the Chenghua era.

description.zh-cn: 郧阳民变首领之一。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Yunyang refugee rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 明朝将领，受命平定郧阳民变。
description.en: A Ming dynasty general tasked with suppressing the Yunyang refugee rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 成化年间明朝与朝鲜联军对建州女真的军事打击行动。
description.en: Military campaigns against the Jianzhou Jurchens by allied Ming and Joseon forces during the Chenghua era.

description.zh-cn: 明代女真三大部之一，后发展为后金及清朝。
description.en: One of the three major Jurchen groups during the Ming dynasty, which later evolved into the Later Jin and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 1392年至1897年间存在于朝鲜半岛的王朝。
description.en: A Korean dynastic kingdom that existed from 1392 to 1897.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 明清两代的皇家宫殿。
description.en: The imperial palace for the Ming and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 明宪宗淑妃，明孝宗生母。
明宪宗第四子，明世宗生父。
明宪宗贵妃，明睿宗朱祐杬生母。
明宪宗极度宠信比他年长17岁的万贵妃，万贵妃去世后，宪宗因悲伤过度而病逝。
description.en: The Chenghua Emperor was extremely infatuated with Imperial Noble Consort Wan, who was 17 years his senior. After her death, the emperor fell ill from grief and died soon after.

description.zh-cn: 土木堡之变中明英宗被俘，导致朱见深被立为太子。
description.en: After Emperor Yingzong was captured in the Tumu Crisis, Zhu Jianshen was made the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 景泰三年，朱祁钰将太子朱见深废为沂王。
description.en: In the third year of the Jingtai era, Emperor Zhu Qiyu deposed Crown Prince Zhu Jianshen, demoting him to Prince of Yi.

description.zh-cn: 夺门之变后明英宗复辟，朱见深被重立为太子。
description.en: After Emperor Yingzong was restored to the throne in the Duomen Coup, Zhu Jianshen was re-established as the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 即位之初为于谦平反昭雪。
description.en: Upon ascending the throne, he posthumously rehabilitated Yu Qian.

description.zh-cn: 任用李贤为内阁首辅等贤臣。
description.en: Appointed capable ministers like Li Xian, who served as Grand Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 恢复其叔朱祁钰的皇帝尊号。
description.en: Restored the imperial title of his uncle, Zhu Qiyu.

description.zh-cn: 设立西厂以加强特务统治。
description.en: Established the Western Depot to strengthen secret police rule.

description.zh-cn: 通过在皇帝面前表演诙谐幽默戏进行讽谏，导致汪直逐步失宠。
description.en: Through satirical and humorous performances before the emperor, he caused Wang Zhi to gradually fall out of favor.

description.zh-cn: 作为御史弹劾汪直欺君枉法。
description.en: As an imperial censor, he impeached Wang Zhi for deceiving the emperor and breaking the law.

description.zh-cn: 将汪直调离京城，并解散西厂。
description.en: Transferred Wang Zhi out of the capital and disbanded the Western Depot.

description.zh-cn: 在房县大石厂立黄旗起义，为郧阳民变的首领之一。
description.en: Raised a yellow banner and started an uprising at Dashi Factory in Fang County, becoming one of the leaders of the Yunyang refugee rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 受明宪宗派遣，讨伐并平定了郧阳民变。
description.en: Dispatched by the Chenghua Emperor, he campaigned against and suppressed the Yunyang refugee rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 决定用兵挞伐多次犯边的建州女真，史称成化犁庭。
description.en: Decided to use military force against the frequently raiding Jianzhou Jurchens, a campaign known as the 'Chenghua Ploughing'.

description.zh-cn: 成化年间，明朝与朝鲜联手进攻建州女真。
description.en: During the Chenghua era, the Ming and Joseon dynasties jointly attacked the Jianzhou Jurchens.

description.zh-cn: 成化犁庭军事行动对建州女真造成了沉重打击。
description.en: The Chenghua Ploughing military campaign dealt a heavy blow to the Jianzhou Jurchens.
